about_the_game:
This original soundtrack, composed by Mr. Noriyuki Iwadare, includes a total of 17 tracks, featuring the main theme "C.A.R.D.S. RPG: The Misty Battlefield"

Composer of the main theme: Noriyuki Iwadare
Composer for the battle music: Shota Fukagawa

Please enjoy the world of this work through its music.
